name: copilotprompts-m365-80s-legends
title: Selfie with 80's Legends
shortDescription: A photorealistic 1980s-style backstage selfie featuring the reference subject with four music legends, captured with cinematic lighting, authentic styling, and a filmic finish.
longDescription: The prompt generates a photorealistic 9:16 vertical selfie featuring the person from the reference photo with Michael Jackson, Prince, Whitney Houston, and Tina Turner, all styled in authentic 1980s fashion.

thumbnails.alt: Get your own selfie with some of the top music legends from the 80's.
